Detailed Description

Calculate mean and standard deviation and find minimum and maximum value.

The minimum and maximum is not searched/memorised if AVERAGE_WITHOUT_MIN_MAX is defined.

Definition at line 21 of file Average_t.hh.

Member Function Documentation

void Average_t::add ( Float_t  value,
Float_t  weight = 1. 
) [inline]

Build the sum and the sum of squares and find the minimum and maximum value.

The sums can be used later to calculate the mean and the standard deviation

Parameters:
value the value to be added to the sum and the sum of squares
weight the weight given to this value in the sums. (
See also:
calculate)

Definition at line 39 of file Average_t.hh.

References weight().

void Average_t::calculate (  )  [inline]

Calculate the standard deviation and the mean.

The mean and the standard deviation are stored in the locations which are also used for the sums. Therefore if further values are added after calculate() was called, the result is undefined.

Definition at line 51 of file Average_t.hh.

References mean(), and sigma().

Double_t Average_t::mean (  )  const [inline]

Return the mean value.

returns only a correct result after at least 1 value was added and calculate was called.
